title: Authorizing the director of alcoholic beverage control to issue licenses for the sale of alcoholic liquor to persons convicted of a felony if such conviction is more than 10 years old.

other_titles.title: AN ACT concerning alcoholic beverages; relating to eligibility for licensure under the Kansas liquor control act and the club and drinking establishment act; authorizing the director of alcoholic beverage control to issue licenses to convicted felons when such conviction occurred more than 10 years prior to application for a license and a determination of sufficient rehabilitation is made; amending K.S.A. 41-2623 and K.S.A. 2024 Supp. 41-311 and repealing the existing sections.

actions.description: Referred to Committee on Federal and State Affairs
